When we have morals we can have better relationships with others and have peace. In Psychology Today there was an article about morality.(Morality By Design) People who were real Christians were least likely to deceive their friends.(Morality By Design) Morality is a very important thing to have in our lives. Many people lack morals and this causes us to do bad things. In psychology today there is an article about morality and what people do when they are in a bad situation. Listen to this example, imagine you are on a cruise in the Caribbean.(Psychology Today) The engine on the boat explodes, and the ship starts to sink.(Psychology Today)Only a few of the ship's lifeboats are operational, and people start to climb aboard them.(Psychology Today)The boat you are on is so full of people, it is likely to sink, but if you push a few people off the lifeboat, then many more will be saved. What would you do(Psychology Today) If we don’t have good and high morals the of course we would push people off of the ship. If we were to do so we would be selfish. If we have good high morals than we would just go on as we are or we ourselves would get off the boat. We don’t realize how morals affect our behavior and actions.
